tytul_Speakers2:
We are honored to introduce our team of lecturers for the upcoming
TCM Congress in Krakow. All our speakers are experienced
practitioners of Chinese medicine, with solid educational and
practical background.
opis_Organizers:
The event is organized by the Polish Society of Traditional
Chinese Medicine, whose aim is to promote Traditional
Chinese Medicine and disseminate and support the application
of scientific achievements in the field of prevention, diagnostics, dietetics,
acupuncture, acupressure, massage, cupping, Qi-Kung movement exercises and
pharmacology of Traditional Chinese Medicine, and to promote progress in
this field.
link_Organizers: Polish Society of Traditional Chinese Medicine
opis1_Hotel:
Galaxy**** is a unique hotel in the center of Krakow, located
near the Old Town, right on the Vistula River. By choosing to stay
with us you will receive a palette of positive emotions. We are at your
disposal throughout your stay. We are happy to help you spend
an exceptional time in the capital of Malopolska. Let's meet!
opis2_Hotel:
Those wishing to make a reservation with a discount, please send
inquiries to the address: konferencje@jordan.pl with
the note 'Chinese Medicine'. The pool of available rooms for this period
is very limited, we encourage you to make reservations as
soon as possible.
opis_Contact: We are here to help you
tytul_Koszyk: Buy a ticket for the event
opis_Koszyk: We have the following tickets for you. Standard ticket, discounted ticket, and special ticket. Discounted ticket - for ETCMA members, special ticket - for members of the Polish Society of Traditional Chinese Medicine (PTTMC)
opis_Koszyk2: On this page, you will find files to download. The files are available for everyone who purchased a ticket for the event.
opis_faqs: Do you have a question or want to know more? Write to us at
opis_faqs2: We will respond as soon as possible. Below we have collected the most frequently asked questions.
opis_Download: On this page you will find all downloadable files related to our events.
